createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.info: Your account was created! After you verified your account in the email we sent you, you can log into your account.

landing.login: Log In To An Existing Account

errors.usernameToShort: Username should be at least 4 Characters long.
errors.passwordNotLongEnough: Password should be at least 8 Characters long.
errors.shouldContainNumber: Password should contain at least one number.
errors.shouldContainNormalChar: Password should contain at least one letter character.
errors.shouldContainSpecialChar: Password should contain at least one special character.
errors.gameNameToShort: Name should be at least 3 Characters long.

backend.100: An error occurred in the backend.
backend.112: The user could not be found.
backend.122: The account could not be verified.
backend.135: The user could not be deleted.
backend.140: The game could not be found.
backend.141: The name of the game is missing.
backend.142: You could not join the game.
backend.143: The opcode is missing (this is an internal error).
backend.144: The opcode is invalid (this is an internal error).
backend.146: You are already in a game.

wait.qrcodeInfo: Other Player an join the game directly with the QRCode.

sharesheet.title: Share your game!
sharesheet.info: Share a link to join your game with your friends.

maxPlayers.title: Amount of Players
maxPlayers.info: Change maximum amount of players for your game.

maxDraw.title: Max. Draw Amount
maxDraw.info: Choose the maximum amount of cards a player can draw.

maxCardsOnHand.title: Max. Cards On Hand
maxCardsOnHand.info: Choose the maximum amount of cards a player is allowed to have on their hand.

initialCards.title: Amount Of Cards
initialCards.info: Choose the amount of cards each player is supplied with at the start of a game..

recaptcha.title: I'm not a robot
recaptcha.error: Some error occurred in the checking process. - Please retry later.

result.fail: Failed Bot Check! - Please retry later.

auth.name: Authentication Cookies
auth.description: We use cookies to store your login session across multiple browser session, so that you don't have to re-enter your credentials every time you visit.

recaptcha.name: Google reCAPTCHA Cookies
recaptcha.description: We use Google reCAPTCHA in order to prevent spam. Google reCAPTCHA needs cookies in order to analyze your interactions with the website.

disallowed.title: Missing Cookies
disallowed.info: Login- and account-creation functionality needs Google reCAPTCHA cookies enabled. Please change your settings and try again.

join.title: Join {0}!
join.text: You got invited into a zwoo game, use the link to join now!

promotePlayer.title: Promote {0} to a host?
promotePlayer.body: Are you sure that you want to promote {0}? You will lose your host status.

kickPlayer.title: Kick {0}?
kickPlayer.body: Are you sure, that you want to kick {0}?

selectColor.title: Choose a color
selectColor.info: Choose the color, that should be played with from now on.

wrongVersion.title: Wrong Version
wrongVersion.info: You need to upgrade zwoo to the latest version in order to play games.
